channel.title: Kaiju Point Standings
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Kaiju Point Standings"

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: Anyone can join for any amount of time, but only if we have room at the time (which we often do not).

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: Is this offer specifically for long-term members of the village, or would it be at all acceptable to join the village for the purpose of earning an item?

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded:
Keep in mind that damage doesn't matter for anything except for Terri 3. Terri 3 only matters if you're in Season 3 or higher. Everything else is determined by number of attacks (where higher attacks gives you a greater probability of getting the item, even if you're hitting for next to nothing).

Cybuster has only received about 3 drops out of our past ~30 kaiju that weren't from Terri 3. She's also doing about 40-50% of all the damage to the kaiju. And she's lost some Terri 3 drops too (though not many).

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: … Does that mean we might actually stand a chance at getting some of these items ourselves?

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded:
Cybuster is a Sannin with Hard Corps, and since she hit her loop timer, she's been juicing to full every day. This means her damage is multiplied by 1.5x, 2x, and then 1.6x, for a total of 4.8x normal damage. To do 150 damage per hit, she only needs ~32 successes. She also gets between 11 and 12 successes automatically each hit (Poisoned Daggers, Bring the House Down, Letter of Marque, and Plug Suit/Power Over 9000), meaning she only needs 20-21 successes from the dice.

She's also using Terri 3 (+5 kaiju damage), and potentially wasteland allies that give +8 and +6 levels respectively, so there's 14 levels right there, and 5 more damage. Considering she's at her loop timer with a Knightmare frame in S3, her base levels are ~29-33 in all stats. Keep in mind that she's won pretty much every monster drop we've had so far (with a couple of exceptions). That's just made her ability to do damage grow.

Having said all that, she's going to be forced to loop in about a week and a half.

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: He could buy more Kaiju Dmg from the Juice Bar!?! ^^

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: wait… how is cy doing more than 150 damage to kaiju, on average? wtf? As a matter of fact… against one of them, he got 335 average damage per hit! 2/3 of that (for the +50%)… is 223. Assuming he got 5 successes for bringing down the house… That doesn't even almost sound like a reasonable number of levels to have. I have to be missing something.

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: Yay, I got my first 10 points :D Uzuki-chan, I'd be attacking the kaiju five times a day and would spy once I hit Sp. Jonin (maybe) :)

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: To clarify, the current standings are updated to the day roll that started that day. (So if it says 9/15, it includes everything that happened before the day roll that started the day of 9/15).

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded:
The 118 on me can't be true..

48+48 = 98

I had 61 points before i did those 2 spying days, and today i should get +30 more.

So it should be, 158+30 = /

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: I'm generally not going to check, since it takes too much time. However, it's better for the village if they're in NRF villages.

item.title: Re: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded: Uzuki, can we put spies on non-NRF villages?

item.title: Kaiju Point Standings
item.content:encoded:
These points are used for purchasing kaiju drops, when they become available. You can obtain points in the following ways:

Attacking a kaiju: +1 pt. per attack (top 10% of attackers on a kaiju get double points)
Spying on another village: +3 pt. per spy placed

For duplicate kaiju drops (all but 5 of them), the system will work like this. Base cost will be kaiju's health divided by 25. In the event that more than one person has enough points to buy the item, people should send me 1 message saying how much they're willing to spend on it. The item will go to the person who bid the most, but they will only have to pay the amount the second place bidder bid + 1 point (minimum of the item's cost). If that's a tie, it goes to whoever has more points then. If no one wants to buy an item with points, it goes in the claw machine.

You can still bid on items that are in the claw machine, assuming no one has won them yet. If someone bids the minimum bid for the item when it's in the claw machine, I take it out of the claw machine and send it to them. Otherwise, you're welcome to try and spend ryo to win it.

Bidding is open for the following items:
Big Mouth - 600 pts.
Book of Spoilers - 240 pts.
Carapace Armor - 160 pts.
Claw Card - 280 pts.
Go Piece - 320 pts.
Granola Camouflage - 360 pts.
Groupies - 280 pts.

Regalia - 800 pts.

Spirit of the Demon of the Sand - 1,400 pts.
Spirit of the Nine Tailed Fox - 1200 pts.
Troll Account - 360 pts.
